articles.description: Netflix has come under fire following the releasing of the second series of its hit dating show Love is Blind after two plus-sized women were introduced in the premiere, but not showcased further.
articles.content:
Netflix has come under fire for teasing two plus-sized women in the premiere of its hit dating show Love is Blind's second series - but then dropping them for the remaining episodes.
